Test Objective: Verify Guest User Access to Orders
Test Case Details: Check that guest user sees login message when accessing orders page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to http://127.0.0.1:5000/web/orders
2. Check for alert message
Expected Results: Alert message 'Please login to continue' should be displayed

Test Case Details: Login as admin and navigate to admin dashboard from navbar
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Click Admin link from navbar
3. Verify admin dashboard loads
Expected Results: Admin dashboard should be accessible and display dashboard elements

Test Case Details: Save Total Orders and Total Revenue from admin dashboard
Pre-Condition: Admin logged in and on admin dashboard
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to admin dashboard
2. Read Total Orders value
3. Read Total Revenue value
4. Save both values
Expected Results: Total Orders and Total Revenue should be displayed and saved successfully

Test Objective: Verify User Login and Product Navigation
Test Case Details: login as regular user then navigate to products
Test Steps: 1. Login as regular user 2. Navigate to http://127.0.0.1:5000/web/products
Post-Condition: User is logged in and on products page
Expected Results: User should be logged in and products page should load

Test Case Details: Add products to cart and save their prices
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to products page
2. Add multiple products to cart
3. Save product prices from cart
Post-Condition: Products added to cart and prices saved
Expected Results: Prices should be saved for later verification in orders page

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to http://127.0.0.1:5000/web/cart
2. Verify cart page loads
Expected Results: Cart page should display added products

Test Steps:
1. Click 'Proceed to Checkout' button
2. Verify checkout page loads

Test Case Details: Enter valid shipping address and complete checkout
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid shipping address
2. Submit checkout form
3. Verify navigation to orders page
Post-Condition: User is automatically navigated to orders page

Test Case Details: Check that order price matches saved cart price
Pre-Condition: User on orders page with new order
Test Steps:
1. Find the new order on orders page
2. Compare order total with saved cart price
3. Verify they match
Expected Results: Order total should match the saved cart price exactly

Test Case Details: Check that all order status tabs are displayed
Test Steps:
1. Verify All tab is visible
2. Verify Pending tab is visible
3. Verify Processing tab is visible
4. Verify Shipped tab is visible
5. Verify Delivered tab is visible
Expected Results: All tabs (All; Pending; Processing; Shipped; Delivered) should be displayed

Test Case Details: Click Pending tab and verify order status is Pending
Pre-Condition: User on orders page with pending order
Test Steps:
1. Click on Pending tab
2. Verify order is displayed
3. Check order status

Test Objective: Verify Order Details in Pending Tab
Test Case Details: Check order details (date; total; items count; product names) in Pending tab
Pre-Condition: User on Pending tab with order
Test Steps:
1. Verify order date is displayed
2. Verify order total is displayed
3. Verify number of items is displayed
4. Verify product names are correct
Expected Results: Order date; total; number of items; and product names should all be correct

Test Case Details: Click Cancel Order button in Pending tab
Pre-Condition: User on Pending tab with order
Test Steps:
1. Click Cancel Order button
2. Alert dialog appears
Expected Results: Alert dialog should appear asking for confirmation

Test Case Details: Click cancel/dismiss in alert dialog and verify order remains pending
Pre-Condition: Alert dialog displayed from cancel order
Test Steps:
1. Click Cancel/Dismiss in alert dialog
2. Verify order still exists
3. Verify order status is still Pending
Expected Results: Order should remain in Pending status; no changes should occur

Test Steps:
1. Click Cancel Order button again
2. Alert dialog appears

Test Case Details: Click OK/Confirm in alert to cancel order
Test Steps:
1. Click OK/Confirm in alert dialog
2. Wait for cancellation to process
3. Verify inline alert appears
Expected Results: Inline alert 'Order cancelled' should be displayed

Test Case Details: Check that no orders remain in Pending tab after cancellation
Test Steps:
1. Verify Pending tab is active
2. Check for orders
3. Verify 'No orders found' message
Expected Results: Label 'No orders found' should be displayed in Pending tab
